name: GeometryCraft
description:
GeometryCraft is a game about the Mighty Blue Sphere that wages war against the evil Squares. The player controls the Blue Sphere and has to catch as many Red Squares as possible in the 300 seconds they've been given for the mission. There's a catch though! The Red Squares have called their allies, the Yellow Squares, to their aid. If the Mighty Blue Sphere gets hit by too many Yellow Squares, the player dies and it's game over.

The player gains points by colliding with the red squares and loses points by colliding with the yellow squares.

Controls for the game are as follows:

W - Move Forward | S - Move Backwards

A - Move Left | D - Move Right

B - Apply Brakes
